alert.note: Alert for Western Clay; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 6:02PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Clay and southwestern Duval Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 602 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cecil Field, or 10 miles north of Middleburg. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cecil Field and Oakleaf Plantation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
